title: My Husband Keeps Dragging His Feet on Paying Off Debt (Hour 1)
description:
Ken Coleman & Rachel Cruze discuss:

Paying off a 401(k) loan,

Getting on the same page around money in a marriage,

Cash-flowing medical bills,

Knowing when it's time to upgrade the car,

Paying for braces,

How to start financial discussions with a fiancée.


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

NetSuite

Carwiser
